description: Number of simplicial arrangements of n lines in the plane (the lines do not pass through a common point, all cells are triangles).
references: J. E. Goodman and J. O'Rourke, editors, Handbook of Discrete and Computational Geometry, CRC Press, 1997, p. 102.
B. Gr√ºnbaum, Arrangements and Spreads. American Mathematical Society, Providence, RI, 1972, p. 7.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
